text: Zairil Khir Johari (born 17 October 1982) is a Malaysian politician. Since 2013, he has been the Member of Parliament for the seat of Bukit Bendera, Penang. He is a member of the opposition Democratic Action Party. He is the son of Khir Johari, a former Cabinet minister. In 2015, he was appointed the DAP Parliamentary Spokesperson for Education, Science and Technology.
